description: Marco Rubio has been selected by Trump for secretary of state. Rubio has long pushed for tougher US policy on Iran and China, signaling stricter sanctions.
title: Trump pick Rubio could harden oil sanctions on Iran, Venezuela

description: Mauritania's former president Mohamed Ould Abdel Aziz is appealing a case which found him guilty of abuse of power and embezzlement.
title: Mauritania ex-president in court for graft charges appeal

description: UNRWA Commissioner-General Philippe Lazzarini said Israel's ban on the organisation would have "catastrophic consequences", pushing UN member states to act.
title: Entire generation in Gaza would lose education if UNRWA collapses, says UN

description: In a sign of warming ties, Egyptian and Turkish officials have met to discuss the situation in the Horn of Africa amid tension between Somalia and Ethiopia
title: Turkey, Egypt discuss Africa amid Somalia-Ethiopia dispute

description: The Israeli-Palestinian film 'No Other Land' has been the centre of controversy in Germany since winning an award at the Berlin International Film Festival.
title: Germany accuses Israeli Jewish filmmaker of 'antisemitic bias'

description: Russia has rejected Israel's request to monitor Hezbollah arms transfers through Syria, citing its supposed 'counterterrorism' focused mandate in Syria.
title: Russia: Monitoring Hezbollah arms transfer in Syria not our duty

description: Sudan's sovereign council said on Wednesday it would extend the use of the Adre border crossing with Chad for aid delivery.
title: Sudan extends opening of Adre crossing for aid delivery

description: American forces carried out strikes against targets linked to an Iranian-backed militia in Syria in response to a rocket attack on Washington's troops.

description: President-elect Donald Trump thanked Joe Biden for ensuring a smooth transfer of power during his historic return visit.

description: Mike Huckabee, who supports annexation of the West Bank, has been named by US President-Elect Donald Trump as a future ambassador to Israel
title: Who is Mike Huckabee, the 'extremist' new US envoy to Israel?

description: Match of the Day host Gary Lineker says he will leave the BBC when his contract expires, following a rocky road with the broadcaster over comments on Gaza.

description: Israel’s planned Gaza aid routes aim to tighten control over humanitarian relief, sidelining Egypt’s role while responding to US pressure over aid conditions

description: Dutch officials said 10 Israelis had been detained over riots in Amsterdam which happened around a football match

description: Book Club: 'If I Must Die' compiles poems, excerpts of blogs, lectures and interviews as a celebration of Refaat Alareer’s legacy and Palestinian steadfastness
title: Refaat Alareer legacy honoured in posthumous book If I Must Die

description: Massachusetts Air National Guardsman Jack Teixeira was sentenced to 15 years in US prison for leaking Pentagon documents.
title: Pentagon leaker Jack Teixeira sentenced to 15 years in US prison

description: Voters in Somaliland, a breakaway region of Somalia at the centre of rising tensions in the Horn of Africa, flocked early to polling stations on Wednesday.
title: As Somaliland votes, its leaders seek international recognition

description: Climate groups have criticised the participation of oil companies in the COP29 summit in Azerbaijan, pointing out links to Israel's war on Gaza

description: Russia has urged Israel to refrain from launching aerial strikes in its conflict with Lebanon's Hezbollah near one of Moscow's bases in Syria

description: Yemen's Houthis said on Tuesday they conducted two military operations against U.S. naval vessels in the Red and Arabian seas.

title: Sayeeda Warsi on Tory Islamophobia in Muslims Don't Matter

description: A Palestinian man who tried to assist people at a car crash site in the West Bank was shot and killed by Israeli forces, who also demolished several homes

description: Beirut's southern suburbs are still being bombed by Israel, while buildings acting as shelters for the displaced are targeted in other villages

title: US calls for end to Gaza war, gives Israel 'free pass' over aid

description: Lebanon's telecoms minister has warned about the 'dangerous' scenario that could unravel amid a telecoms blackout as Israel's bombards infrastructure.

description: CACI Interanion has been ordered to pay $42 million in damages for its role in torture at the Abu Ghraib prison in Iraq amid the 2003-2004 US invasion
